select --病人基本信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientCode as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 case when br.PatientSex=0 then '男' else '女' end as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 --year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.InPatientCode as SocialSecurityCard, --住院号 zy.WardArea as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.BedNumber as BEDNO --床位
from v_disinfect_patientinfo br left join v_disinfect_inpatientinfos zy on br.PatientCode=zy.PatientCode where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 case when br.PatientSex=0 then '男' else '女' end as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 --year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.OPERAT_DEPT_CODE as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT --科室 from v_disinfect_patientinfo br left join v_disinfect_operationinfos ss on br.MedicalRecordCode=ss.MedicalRecordCode where 1=1 {0}

select br.PatientCode, --病人编号 br.PatientName, --病人姓名 br.MedicalRecordCode, --病历号 br.PatientSex as PatientSex,--性别 br.PatientBirthday,--出生年月 --year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as Age,--年龄 br.PatientIDCard, --身份证号 br.SocialSecurityCard,--社保号 br.PatientAddress,--地址 br.PatientPhone, --联系电话 br.HighRiskInfectivity, --是否高危
gh.RegisterCode,--挂号系统编号 gh.OutPatientEmergency,--急诊，门诊 gh.RegisterDateTime, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterDepartment,--挂号科室 gh.RegisterNumber --挂号号
from v_disinfect_patientinfo br left join v_disinfect_registerinfos gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by gh.RegisterDateTime Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 case when br.PatientSex=0 then '男' else '女' end as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.PatientBirthday as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄
gh.RegisterCode as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.RegisterDateTime as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterDepartment as REGISTERDEPARTMENT --挂号科室 from v_disinfect_patientinfo br left join v_disinfect_registerinfos gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by gh.RegisterDateTime Desc
